title: Rethinking musical note naming from a mathematical point of view | Maths and Music | N J Wildberger

media:group.media:title: Rethinking musical note naming from a mathematical point of view | Maths and Music | N J Wildberger
media:group.media:description:
Let's step back a bit from our piano focused notation for naming musical notes, and adopt a more mathematical, logical terminology. This will have major advantages to our understanding of the structure of intervals, scales, modes and chords going forward. We use this notation to discuss the intervals that compose the most familiar triads, the major, minor, diminished and augmented triangles.
